item.title: Google Cloud Series: Compute Engine In Action
item.description: ============================================= Objectives: Deploy a highly scalable nodejs app on GCE. Prerequisites: Folk and clone this repo: https://github.com/hangnhat57/compute-engine-101/ Create a service account which have Roles : Compute Instance Admin (v1) and Source Repo Writer Create a service account Deployment Strategy: 1. Create a startup script which will automatically get code, install dependencies then start web server right after instances start. 2. Create an instance template with startup script. 3. Create an instance managed group and enable autoscaling.
